phrases: Anna is a 44-year-old female with a past medical history significant for arthritis, gout, and reflux, who presents today for follow up of her chronic problems.
my arthritis is starting to get better... I've been trying to move my body, doing pilates, lifting weights... helped me build up some muscle, the joint pain is has been going away.

I'm walking about a mile, a mile and a half a day.
The medication helped it go down and go away. Hopefully, it doesn't come back.
